result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shawn Claebon Perkins

records.addlTxt:
Case Called: 10:41 am
INCLUDES 15CF286 AND 15CF580.
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo. Defendant appears in person and with Atty Jay Kronenwetter.
Defendant makes statement. 
COURT ORDERS:
15CF580:
Ct. 1 (Possession of Methamphetamine)>> Sentence W/H- 5 Years Probation, Concurrent. CONDITIONS: I/S 1 Year MCJ for rule violations, Assessment/treatment/counseling as recommended including AODA, Maintain Full time work/Full time school or a combination and when not fully engaged must complete 9 Hours of Community Service, $250 fine, Court Costs including DNA Surcharge, DNA Sample. Court finds 2 days credit. 

Ct. 3 (Felon Possess Firearm)>>  Sentence W/H- 5 Years Probation, Concurrent. CONDITIONS: Assessment/treatment/counseling as recommended including AODA, Maintain Full time work/Full time school or a combination and when not fully engaged must complete 9 Hours of Community Service, Court Costs including DNA Surcharge, DNA Sample. Court finds 2 days credit.

Ct. 5 (Possession of THC)>>  Sentence W/H- 1 Year Probation, Concurrent. CONDITIONS: Assessment/treatment/counseling as recommended including AODA, Maintain Full time work/Full time school or a combination and when not fully engaged must complete 9 Hours of Community Service, Court Costs including DNA Surcharge, DNA Sample. Court finds 2 days credit.

Adj: 10:48 am
Sentencing hearing on July 22, 2016 at 10:30 am.
w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief

PLEA:

INCLUDES 15CF286, 15CF580.  Absolute sobriety from drugs/alcohol.  Contact Attic Correctional Services at 715-848-3202 - Day Report - drugs (re: file 15CF580).  No contact with victim(s):  Associated Bank - in Rothschild (re: file 15CF286).
Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.  No controlled substances without valid prescription (re: file 15CF580).
